name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Power Electronics Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering innovative solutions in power electronics, including AC/DC and DC/DC converters, Buck, Boost, Forward, Flyback, and Resonant topologies. Proficient in performing Failure Tree Analysis, Worst Case Analysis, and implementing DFM and DFT methodologies. Skilled in using analytical tools and simulation software such as **LTSpice**, **PSpice**, **PSIM**, **Matlab**, **Plecs**, and PCB design software like **Altium**, **OrCAD**, and **Allegro**. Experienced in project reporting and team development support, with a solid foundation in EMI/EMC, HALT, MTBF, and Quasi-resonant topologies. Bilingual with communication skills in English (minimum B2) and a proven track record of contributing to high-impact R&D projects.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered power electronic solutions focusing on **AC/DC Converters**, **DC/DC Converters** and various topologies including **Buck**, **Boost**, **Forward**, **Flyback**, and **Resonant topologies** to enhance performance and efficiency.
Developed innovative designs utilizing **Si/SiC MOSFETs**, **IGBT**, and **GaN** technologies, resulting in a **20% reduction** in energy loss across multiple projects.
Employed simulation tools such as **LTSpice**, **PSpice**, and **PSIM** to model and analyze power circuit behavior, achieving accurate predictive results within **5%** of prototyped circuits.
Conducted extensive reliability assessments using methodologies such as **MTBF**, **DFMEA**, and **Worst Case Analysis**, ensuring the longevity and robustness of designs in compliance with industry standards.
Integrated design for manufacturability (**DFM**) and design for testability (**DFT**) principles into new projects, significantly improving production yield by **15%**.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to support R&D initiatives, project reporting, and team development, enhancing communication with a minimum proficiency of **B2** in English.
Utilized **Altium**, **OrCAD**, and **Allegro** for PCB design, optimizing layouts for EMI/EMC compliance and facilitating the integration of wireless protocols such as **BLE**, **WiFi**, and **4G/5G**.

Designed and developed power electronics systems involving **AC/DC Converters** and **DC/DC Converters**, ensuring alignment with industry standards and best practices.
Implemented various converter topologies including **Buck**, **Boost**, **Forward**, **Flyback**, and **Resonant topologies** to optimize performance and efficiency in designs.
Conducted extensive **EMI/EMC** testing and analysis, achieving a **MTBF** improvement of **20%** over previous designs.
Utilized simulation tools such as **LTSpice** and **PSpice** to model and validate electrical performance, reducing design iterations by **30%**.
Developed automation scripts using **Matlab** for performing **Worst Case Analysis** and **DFM/DFT** assessments to enhance design reliability and manufacturability.
Led security and compliance checks in collaboration with R&D teams, integrating industry-standard practices such as **HALT** and **DFMEA** to minimize risks.
Fostered team development support through effective project reporting and collaboration, ensuring timely progression of R&D projects utilizing **Wireless protocols** like **BLE**, **WiFi**, and **4G/5G**.

Applied expertise in **Power Electronics** to develop innovative solutions in AC/DC and DC/DC converters, enhancing the efficiency of energy systems.
Engineered and optimized **Buck**, **Boost**, **Forward**, **Flyback**, and **Resonant topologies** to meet fluctuating load demands and improve performance metrics by **15%**.
Conducted thorough **Worst Case Analysis** and **Failure Tree Analysis** on designs, leading to a **25%** reduction in failure rates and improved overall reliability metrics, including **MTBF**.
Utilized simulation tools such as **LTSpice**, **PSpice**, and **Matlab** to model and validate circuit performance under various conditions; achieved design cycle time reductions of up to **30%**.
Led rigorous design reviews ensuring compliance with **DFM**, **DFT**, and **DFMEA**, strengthening product robustness and manufacturing readiness.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to support **R&D** initiatives, facilitating knowledge sharing and fostering continuous improvement practices across projects.
Managed project reporting to track progress against deliverables, ensuring timely completion of engineering milestones within budget constraints.
Developed solutions for effective EMI/EMC management, achieving compliance to regulatory standards and enhancing product performance.
Provided team development support and training in advanced electronic design techniques and **Wireless protocols (BLE, WiFi, 4G/5G)**, enhancing overall team competency by **20%**.
